Implementation approach: We will create a snake game using the Pygame library in Python.
Program call flow:
sequenceDiagram
 participant G as Game
 participant UI as UI
 participant S as SnakeGame
 G->>UI: update()
 UI->>S: draw()
 S->>G: update_game_state()
 G-->>UI: game_over
 if game_over:
     UI->>S: reset_snake_game()
 sequenceDiagram
 participant R as Direction
 R->>S: change_direction(direction)
 S->>R: get_current_direction()
